ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night audio video CMOS security camera
36 IR illuminators for night vision. 6.0mm Lens. 520TVL. Connection Type: RCA audio & RCA video & 2.1 mm center positive power plugs
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Built-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Package including: 2 of security cameras, 2 of 12V 500mA power supplies, 2 of audio video power extension cables and 2 of bonus security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 of Day Night Audio Infrared Bullet Security Cameras 520TVL Built-in 36 IR Leds 6mm Lens for CCTV Home Surveillance System with Power Supplies and Extension Cables WM8
